attributes.action: Disband the current government, put a 12 month delay on Brexit.
attributes.background:
Disband government, hold general election and stop all current mp's from being a part of a new government 

For the good of our country, please sign this

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to decide who makes up the next Government.

If you would like another general election you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
